mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOH.chat (sender, receiver, content, isRead) VALUES (#{sender}, #{receiver}, #{content}, #{isRead});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat WHERE receiver = #{receiver} AND isRead = 0 ORDER BY sender, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat WHERE (sender = #{sender} AND receiver = #{receiver}) OR (sender = #{receiver} AND receiver = #{sender});
mapper.update: UPDATE chat SET isRead = true WHERE (sender = #{sender} AND receiver = #{receiver}) OR (sender = #{receiver} AND receiver = #{sender});
